verses.verse: Moreover, <WG1161> brethren,<WG80> I would<WG2309> not<WG3756> that ye<WG5209> should be ignorant,<WG50> how that<WG3754> all<WG3956> our<WG2257> fathers<WG3962> were<WG2258> under<WG5259> the<WG3588> cloud,<WG3507> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> passed<WG1330> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> sea;<WG2281>
And <WG2532> were all<WG3956> baptized<WG907> unto<WG1519> Moses<WG3475> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> cloud<WG3507> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> sea;<WG2281>
And <WG2532> did all<WG3956> eat<WG5315> the<WG3588> same<WG846> spiritual<WG4152> meat;<WG1033>

And <WG2532> did all<WG3956> drink<WG4095> the<WG3588> same<WG846> spiritual<WG4152> drink:<WG4188> for<WG1063> they drank<WG4095> of<WG1537> that spiritual<WG4152> Rock<WG4073> that followed<WG190> them: and<WG1161> that Rock<WG4073> was<WG2258> Christ.<WG5547>
But <WG235> with<WG1722> many<WG4119> of them<WG846> God<WG2316> was not well pleased:<WG2106> <WG3756> for<WG1063> they were overthrown<WG2693> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> wilderness.<WG2048>

Now <WG1161> these things<WG5023> were<WG1096> our<WG2257> examples,<WG5179> to the intent we<WG2248> should not lust after<WG1511> <WG3361> <WG1938> evil things,<WG2556> as<WG2531> they also<WG2548> lusted.<WG1937>

Neither <WG3366> be<WG1096> ye idolaters,<WG1496> as<WG2531> were some<WG5100> of them;<WG846> as<WG5613> it is written,<WG1125> The<WG3588> people<WG2992> sat down<WG2523> to eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink,<WG4095> and<WG2532> rose up<WG450> to play.<WG3815>

Neither <WG3366> let us commit fornication,<WG4203> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> committed,<WG4203> and<WG2532> fell<WG4098> in<WG1722> one<WG3391> day<WG2250> three and twenty thousand.<WG5140> <WG1501> <WG5505>
Neither <WG3366> let us tempt<WG1598> Christ,<WG5547> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> also<WG2532> tempted,<WG3985> and<WG2532> were destroyed<WG622> of<WG5259> serpents.<WG3789>
Neither <WG3366> murmur<WG1111> ye, as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> also<WG2532> murmured,<WG1111> and<WG2532> were destroyed<WG622> of<WG5259> the<WG3588> destroyer.<WG3644>

Now <WG1161> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> happened<WG4819> unto them<WG1565> for examples:<WG5179> and<WG1161> they are written<WG1125> for<WG4314> our<WG2257> admonition,<WG3559> upon<WG1519> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> ends<WG5056> of the<WG3588> world<WG165> are come.<WG2658>
Wherefore <WG5620> let him that thinketh<WG1380> he standeth<WG2476> take heed<WG991> lest<WG3361> he fall.<WG4098>

There hath no<WG3756> temptation<WG3986> taken<WG2983> you<WG5209> but<WG1508> such as is common to man:<WG442> but<WG1161> God<WG2316> is faithful,<WG4103> who<WG3739> will not<WG3756> suffer<WG1439> you<WG5209> to be tempted<WG3985> above<WG5228> that<WG3739> ye are able;<WG1410> but<WG235> will with<WG4862> the<WG3588> temptation<WG3986> also<WG2532> make<WG4160> a way to escape,<WG1545> that ye<WG5209> may be able<WG1410> to bear<WG5297> it.
Wherefore, <WG1355> my<WG3450> dearly beloved,<WG27> flee<WG5343> from<WG575> idolatry.<WG1495>
I speak<WG3004> as<WG5613> to wise men;<WG5429> judge<WG2919> ye<WG5210> what<WG3739> I say.<WG5346>

The <WG3588> cup<WG4221> of blessing<WG2129> which<WG3739> we bless,<WG2127> is<WG2076> it not<WG3780> the communion<WG2842> of the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of Christ?<WG5547> The<WG3588> bread<WG740> which<WG3739> we break,<WG2806> is<WG2076> it not<WG3780> the communion<WG2842> of the<WG3588> body<WG4983> of Christ?<WG5547>
For <WG3754> we being many<WG4183> are<WG2070> one<WG1520> bread,<WG740> and one<WG1520> body:<WG4983> for<WG1063> we are all partakers<WG3348> <WG3956> of<WG1537> that one<WG1520> bread.<WG740>
Behold <WG991> Israel<WG2474> after<WG2596> the flesh:<WG4561> are<WG1526> not<WG3780> they which eat<WG2068> of the<WG3588> sacrifices<WG2378> partakers<WG2844> of the<WG3588> altar?<WG2379>

What <WG5101> say<WG5346> I then?<WG3767> that<WG3754> the idol<WG1497> is<WG2076> any thing,<WG5100> or<WG2228> <WG3754> that which is offered in sacrifice to idols<WG1494> is<WG2076> any thing?<WG5100>

But <WG235> I say, that<WG3754> the things which<WG3739> the<WG3588> Gentiles<WG1484> sacrifice,<WG2380> they sacrifice<WG2380> to devils,<WG1140> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> to God:<WG2316> and<WG1161> I would<WG2309> not<WG3756> that ye<WG5209> should have<WG1096> fellowship<WG2844> with devils.<WG1140>

Ye cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> drink<WG4095> the cup<WG4221> of the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> the cup<WG4221> of devils:<WG1140> ye cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> be partakers<WG3348> of the Lord's<WG2962> table,<WG5132> and<WG2532> of the table<WG5132> of devils.<WG1140>
Do we<WG2228> provoke the Lord to jealousy?<WG3863> <WG3588> <WG2962> are<WG2070> we<WG3361> stronger<WG2478> than he?<WG846>

All things<WG3956> are lawful<WG1832> for me,<WG3427> but<WG235> all things<WG3956> are not expedient:<WG4851> <WG3756> all things<WG3956> are lawful<WG1832> for me,<WG3427> but<WG235> all things<WG3956> edify<WG3618> not.<WG3756>
Let no man<WG3367> seek<WG2212> his own,<WG1438> but<WG235> every man<WG1538> another's<WG2087> wealth.
Whatsoever <WG3956> is sold<WG4453> in<WG1722> the meat market,<WG3111> that eat,<WG2068> asking no question<WG350> <WG3367> for conscience sake:<WG1223> <WG4893>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> is the<WG3588> Lord's,<WG2962> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> fullness<WG4138> thereof.<WG848>

<WG1161> If<WG1487> any<WG5100> of them that believe not<WG571> bid<WG2564> you<WG5209> to a feast, and<WG2532> ye be disposed<WG2309> to go;<WG4198> whatsoever<WG3956> is set before<WG3908> you,<WG5213> eat,<WG2068> asking no question<WG350> <WG3367> for conscience sake.<WG1223> <WG4893>

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> say<WG2036> unto you,<WG5213> This<WG5124> is<WG2076> offered in sacrifice unto idols,<WG1494> eat<WG2068> not<WG3361> for his sake<WG1223> <WG1565> that showed<WG3377> it, and<WG2532> for conscience<WG4893> sake: for<WG1063> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> is the<WG3588> Lord's,<WG2962> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> fullness<WG4138> thereof: <WG848>

<WG1161> Conscience,<WG4893> I say,<WG3004> not<WG3780> thine own,<WG1438> but<WG235> of<WG3588> the<WG3588> other:<WG2087> for<WG1063> why<WG2444> is my<WG3450> liberty<WG1657> judged<WG2919> of<WG5259> another<WG243> man's conscience?<WG4893>
For <WG1161> if<WG1487> I<WG1473> by grace<WG5485> be a partaker,<WG3348> why<WG5101> am I evil spoken of<WG987> for<WG5228> that<WG3739> for which I<WG1473> give thanks?<WG2168>
Whether <WG1535> therefore<WG3767> ye eat,<WG2068> or<WG1535> drink,<WG4095> or<WG1535> whatsoever<WG5100> ye do,<WG4160> do<WG4160> all<WG3956> to the<WG1519> glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>
Give none offense,<WG1096> <WG677> neither<WG2532> to the Jews,<WG2453> nor<WG2532> to the Gentiles,<WG1672> nor<WG2532> to the<WG3588> church<WG1577> of God: <WG2316>

Even as I<WG2504> <WG2531> please<WG700> all<WG3956> men in all<WG3956> things, not<WG3361> seeking<WG2212> mine own<WG1683> profit,<WG4851> but<WG235> the<WG3588> profit of many,<WG4183> that<WG2443> they may be saved.<WG4982>
